description: Hail to thee of might and valor: I, a lowly servant of the township of Barovia, send I, a lowly servant of the township of Barovia, send honor to thee. We plead for thy so desperately needed honor to thee. We plead for thy so desperately needed assistance within our community. assistance within our community. The legions of Hell itself are at our gates! The The love of my life, Ireena Kolyana, has been dead rise up from their graves and seek to drag us afflicted by an evil so deadly that even the good people down with them! Not content to slaughter us in our of our town cannot protect her. She languishes from homes, they spread the taint of their horrible curse, so her wound and I would have her saved from this that those they kill join their numbers! menace. There is much wealth in this community. I offer There is much wealth in this community. I offer all that might be had to thee and thy fellows if thou all that might be had to thee and thy fellows if thou shalt but answer my desperate plea. shalt but answer my desperate plea.
